reference.shortdesc: A superscript is text that is printed above the line. It is frequently used in chemical and mathematical formulas.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The sup element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: .
The following attributes are available on this element: , class, keyref, and outputclass.
